messages.title: Standing up for families
messages.content: As a parent, I want to keep Sure Start centres, as well as tax credits. That's why I'll be voting Labour. I feel extremely worried by what the Tories might cut. - Nicole Williams

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will work with employers and trade unions to make sure we have investment in our people and area, and campaign for green jobs to come to Wirral.
I'll stand up for libraries and leisure centres, and campaign for their improvement.
I'll work with businesses to improve shopping parades in Bromborough, Bebington, Eastham, New Ferry and Heswall, and local schools on the vocational curriculum.
I want to see a doubling of apprenticeships available to young people - putting them on the right track to a career.
I will publish my accounts and expenses online in quarterly accounts, and hold a local office open to the public.

issues.environment: campaign for green jobs to come to Wirral
issues.health: Campaigning for Clatterbridge Centre for Oncology

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born and grew up in Wirral south. I went to Brookhurst Primary School and Wirral Grammar. My family has lived in Bromborough for thirty years, working for the NHS and in the rail industry. As a teenager, campaigning in Wirral South for Ben Chapman, I never thought that one day I would have the great honour of being chosen as Labour's candidate to be our Member of Parliament. I have seen many changes in Wirral in the intervening years due to Ben's work and the community working with him. I pledge you to fight for these things for our children - better jobs and education. A world-class education, health and labour policy decision which are driven by the needs of our privileged few above the needs of the many. I would welcome the advice about how best to improve Wirral and let me into your trust. - Alison McGovern

politicalExperience.role: campaigning in Wirral South for Ben Chapman

endorsements.endorsement: Nicole Williams, a resident of Bromborough, endorses Alison McGovern, expressing concerns about potential cuts by Tories.

images.caption: Alison McGovern - your Labour Candidate for Wirral South
Campaigning for Clatterbridge Centre for Oncology
